FuncDef: The display telemetry subscription command displays subscription information. The display telemetry subscription command displays subscription information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a subscription name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters containing letters and digits. Spaces are not supported between letters or digits.

ExtraInfo: To view subscription information, including the subscription name, subscription status, sampling sensor group associated, and destination group associated, run the display telemetry subscription command.
